name: Deck Le Ships!
description:
This is a puzzle card game collaborated with Dan J Seilheimer, a great artist I met from a Discord server. This game is intended for the #chipnjam, the Chip 'N Jam Game Jam. It was a fun game, and this is what we got in 48 hours. 

Artist: Dan J Seilheimer

Programmer: TheGamer

Third parties:

  • Ocean background on the menu screen (found in pinterest.com)
  • Water tile (made by GrumpyDiamond)
  • Menu Song is Pirates of the Caribbean by 2CELLOS (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xj3gU3jACe8)
  • Game song is The Ants Go Marching Instrumental Only (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7g58sPIVuD8)'
  • Most text arts made from cooltext.com

Note: Medium and Hard difficulty is not available yet, so play on Easy mode. Also don't worry if the front page is black. It's just loading.
